update.releaseNotes:
v2.5.0 - Changelog
New --- - Added support for the new Characters: Agnes Digital, Rice Shower (Halloween) and Super Creek (Halloween). - Added support for the new Support Cards: SR Power Fine Motion, SSR Guts Ikuno Dictus, SSR Intelligence Mihono Bourbon, SSR Speed Zenno Rob Roy and SSR Power Tamamo Cross.
Fixes --- - Set application's default locale to "en" to prevent cases where user's country uses commas instead of dots for decimal numbers.
